content.question: Which of the following best describes the claim made by Mustakeem in the second paragraph of the excerpt?

choices.label: African captives who were forced into slavery suffered because of a lack of community.
African captives on slave ships overcame linguistic differences to act against their enslavement.
Slave traders’ efforts to separate African captives often prevented collective action by the enslaved.
Revolts aboard slave ships were often unsuccessful because of African captives’ disorganization and lack of geographical knowledge.

content.answer: African captives on slave ships overcame linguistic differences to act against their enslavement.

topic.text: 2.4: African Resistance on Slave Ships and the Antislavery Movement
